You in?$1#$b#%You quickly agree to be abigails human weight.#$b#%She lays herself down on the floor and motions you over.#$b#%Holding you by your chest and hip, Abigail begins to effortlessly benchpress you.#$b#%As you look down you can see her incredible chest swell and settle with each rep.#$b#%the up and down motion paired with staring at Abigail's swollen pecs is somehow incredibly erotic.#$b#%Abigail senses your desire and brings you down for a passionate kiss.#$b#$You place your hands on her chest and kneed your finders into the grooves of her chest.#$b#%Sadly though Abigail lifts you back up. breaking the kiss, and putting her pecs out of reach.#$b#That was awesome...$12#4b#...But I really need to do a real workout before I get too hot and bothered.$11#$b#Plus, you're not nearly heavy enough to challenge me. *giggle*$1
entries.fall_15: So I was thinking of going for a hike while wearing weighted bands, but I can't find them.#$b#I suppose I could just find a fallen log and carry that with me instead...$3#$b#I'd like to have my hands free though.#$b#Oh! I could always carry you on my shoulder!$1
entries.fall_20: %Abigail's face is beet red, and she's panting slightly.#$b#...$11#$b#Hey you.$11#$b#I just had my injection...$12#$b#I'm going to get so jacked today...$11#$b#*moan* That's the only thing keeping me from jumping you right now...$12#$b#I need to finish my workout before any thing else.$12#$b#But the very second I'm done...$11#$b#...I'm gonna rock your world.$12
entries.fall_25: God these injectinos get me so horny...$11#4b#It makes my workouts super intense though, so it's worth it.#$b#It also helps me to think about what you're going to do to me after I'm done.$11#$b#...I'll be all big, and swollen and turned on...$12#$b#I'm counting on you tonight, @.$12
entries.winter_3: You'd think I'd be pretty immune to the cold, since I'm so big...$3#$b#And I guess I am sort of...$6#$b#But even I feel the chill this time of year...$2#$b#That's why I need you to keep me warm...$4
entries.winter_5: Winter is the perfect season for cave spelunking.#$b#It'd also be a great place for us to find some privacy...$4#$b#You and me all alone in a dark cave...$11#$b#Could be romantic in it's own way...$12
entries.winter_10: %Abigail is warming her hands by rubbing them together.#$b#%Even just this basic motion casues her prodigious muscles to bounce and flex.#$b#%Becuase her arms are out in front of her, her chest is putting on a particularly amazintg show.#$b#%You put your staring on hold for a moment,and embrace your muscular wife, hoping to share your warmth with her.#$b#Hmmm, you're actually pretty warm, @. Thanks for the hug.$11
entries.winter_15: I might build a snow woman after my workout today.#$b#I've gotten pretty good at it too!$1#$b#Well until I get carried away...$3#$b#I end up adding too much snow to make it look buff, and it falls apart.$1
entries.winter_20: I figured this winter you'd have lots of free time on your hands, but you've managed to stay busy#$b#It's kind of a shame, I was hoping we couldsnuggle up to fight off teh cold more often.$11#$b#You know how hot my body gets after an intense day of pumping...$13
entries.winter_25: It would be really cool if I got some new weights at the Spirit festival today.#$b#But I know that no one would be able to lug around what I can lift so the changes are slim.$3
entries.winter_28: %Abigail is acting strangely.#$b#%She's holding a continuous flex, but it's almost like she's trying to supress something.#$b#Hrgg...*grunt* Oh god...$9#$b#@, I think it's finally happening.$9#$b#This whole year I've pumped and pumped and pumped up my muscles.$9#$b#A huge growth spurt is about to happen, I can just feel it!$8#$b#I can't wait for you to see what I look like tomorrow, baby.$11
entries.spring_Abigail: I may like the colder seasons, but by the end I'm always glad to see spring arrive.
entries.summer_Abigail: Oh man... I could go for some chocolate cake.#$b#...It doesn't fit into my meal schedule for today though...$3#$b#So I guess I'll just hold off...$2
entries.fall_Abigail: Maybe I'll rake up a big pile of leaves today.#$b#I used to play with the leaves a lot as a kid!$1
entries.winter_Abigail: Remember when we played 'Prairie King' together in my room, so long ago? Those were good times.$h
entries.spouseRoom_Abigail: God I love big fantasy swords, don't you?#$e#I'm thinking of starting a collection.#$b#Problem is I just wanna swing em around instead of displaying them!$1#$b#This one is from Street Stalker, it's the sword of a badass zombie-vampire hunter.#$b#I got it on the net second hand, so it's not perfect.$3#$b#But it's awesome anyway!$1
